summary: A Serana face overhaul because some people requested it. Kept to most of her vanilla aspects--no warpaint or scars this time.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69461/?]UPDATED SERANA MOD HERE[/url][/center][/size]

[size=7]Updates [/size]
December 1 2012- A portion of 1.3 is released--only so far has Vanilla Hairstyle with Vampire Eyes. Serana's textures (except for vampire eyes) are [color=orange] permanent[/color]. If you want to replace these textures, read the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/627/]article[/url] in the tab!

[size=7]About[/size]

I'll post more images soon and update my other files. Sorry but there were personal issues I had to deal with this weekend. ALSO NOTE THAT THE EYE COMPARISON IMAGE WAS A TAKEN WITH BETA VERSION DAYS AGO. There were barely any changes though.

There are six versions altogether with different eyes and hairstyles.
The [size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7403]Lovely Hairstyles[/url][/size] version requires Lovely Hairstyles. I hope that’s obvious. The vanilla hair keeps her original hair.
The eye options are vampire, demon, or normal yellow eyes. If you want to go with vampire eyes, I recommend [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249]Improved Eyes DAWNGUARD[/url] because it shrinks down the vampire irises to normal size.

[size=7] Installation[/size]
MANUALLY install by dropping whatever Serana you like into your Skyrim root folder.

[size=5]Uninstallation[/size]
Remove the .TARGA, .dds, and the .NIF files with the number [size=3] 000026bc[/size] located at
skyrim/Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint/DAWNGUARD.esm and
skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/DAWNGUARD.esm



[size=6] KNOWN ISSUES[/size]
UFO will work for Serana, but sometimes not entirely. Just make sure that she is hired FIRST and dismissed LAST.

If you get CTD on a save, reload it again. Sometimes it only takes two times for the game to run my mod. If that doesn't work, reboot Skyrim again and go to the main menu. Hit the tilde key and type in to the console 'coc qasmoke'. Hit ESC and load up your savegame again.

Mods that make Serana transform into a vampire-lord maybe INCOMPATIBLE with my mod.

[size=6] CREDITS[/size]
[list] [*]Navetsea, for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554] body and face textures [/url]
[*] Zzjay, for her [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483] Normal Maps[/url]
[*] Radioragae for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953] Better Face Gen [/url]
[*] Mr Lenski for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]Coverwomen’s Eyebrows[/url]
[*] Betterbecause for your [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394] Body Imperfect Resources[/url]
[*] Misjennabee for your [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249] eye textures [/url]
[*] Sn00p for importing CDPROJEKTRed's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7403]Witcher 2 Hairstyles [/url]
[*] Natilde for your [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25673]tutorial[/url]
[*] Indirectly, Baskimm for creating the infamous [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038]Girls of Skyrim [/url] mod which I used a reference to create my own standalone appearances for characters in the Creation Kit
[*] Bethesda for making Skyrim a great game to mod
[/list]
[center][size=7] MY OTHER COMPILATIONS[/SIZE]
